Object.Name: BED
Object.HowtoUse: This is the bed. It includes a simple-pressure sensor that serves to monitor different states (e.g. pressure-on/pressure-off), thus relaying to researchers the patient's usage of the bed.

Object.Name: BACK DOOR
Object.HowtoUse: This is the back door of the Smart Condo.

Object.Name: KITCHEN ISLAND
Object.HowtoUse: This is the kitchen island. It can be raised or lowered electronically to accomodate different ergonomic postures for various tasks, sitting or standing positions.

Object.Name: AUTOPANTRY
Object.HowtoUse: This kitchen cabinet is an autopantry. It is motor powered enabling each shelf to automatically lower and revolve for easy reach. This device operates in a similar way to a vertical carousel and can move in both directions for either an up or down motion.

Object.Name: KITCHEN SINK
Object.HowtoUse: This is the kitchen sink. It can be raised or lowered electronically to accomodate ergonomic postures for various tasks as well as sitting or standing positions.

Object.Name: TOILET
Object.HowtoUse: This is the toilet. It includes a sensor that monitors flushing.

Object.Name: DINING TABLE
Object.HowtoUse: This is the dining table. It is wheelchair accessible. Its pull out storage for cutlery and condiments allows for energy conservation.

Object.Name: FRONT DOOR
Object.HowtoUse: This is the front door of the Smart Condo.

Object.Name: FLOOR
Object.HowtoUse: This is the floor. The Smart Condo's floor was made with cork flooring. This feature helps to absorb foot falls.
